questions_answers.How many different agents appear and wha: There are 5 agents: clavo.ugr.es, hera.ugr.es, hera2, Siem.
questions_answers.Which type of event is the most critical: The most critical event is Possible kernel level rootkit with level 11.
questions_answers.Which event is repeated the most times?: The most repeated event is Samba connection denied., 3221 times.
